title: Real Estate Investor Secures $750K Bridge Loan in 7 Days
challenge: Off-market flip opportunity in competitive market. Traditional banks wanted 45-60 days for approval. Needed funding in under 2 weeks or lose deal.
solution: Asset-based underwriting focused on property value and exit strategy, not just borrower credit. Conservative 65% LTV. Clear terms, fast decision.
testimonial: Banks said no. BuildUp said yes in 7 days. My flip is now cash-flowing $8K/month because I didn't miss the deal.

title: Accredited Investor Earns 12% on $500K Private Credit Investment
challenge: Looking for better risk-adjusted returns than stock market volatility. Wanted real estate exposure without active management or tenant headaches.
solution: Private credit investment secured by real estate. First-lien position. Conservative LTVs. Borrower vetting by experienced underwriters.
testimonial: Earning 12% secured by real estate with downside protection. Funded in 9 days when banks wanted 6 months of paperwork.
